title: Androrize! Make money with Android
description:
It seems to me that everybody is missing the big picture regarding the smartphone boom... 

This new money-making revolution headed by Android is opening up endless possibilities and itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s happening unnoticed.


That\\\'s why I decided to put all the available knowledge together in ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œAndrorize! The ultimate guide to make money with AndroidÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½.

 
Samsung, Amazon, HTC, LG, Toshiba, Motorola, Sony Ericsson and Huawei already trusted their products to AndroidÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ Why shouldn\\\'t we? 

Androrize! Helps you tap into a world of possibilities...

Join the Android Revolution!

 

With Androrize! you will discover:


 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The ongoing Android Gold Rush. 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ What apps are for and why people are talking so much about them. 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ How to get ideas for new apps. 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ How to bring your idea to life, even if you are clueless in all respects of the computing world. 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ How to sell your app will show you the most effective ways to reach the global market and earn money with it! 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ What makes a successful app covers the stories behind the most acclaimed -and profitable- apps on the Android Market. Which are their secrets and what can we learn from them? 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ How to avoid common startup mistakes.

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Marketing on the mobile age will show you the most effective ways to deliver messages and tell the world about your product or service. 

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ And last but not least, I describe more ways to generate money with the OS, like using available technology and software to develop cost-effective enterprise tools.

And this is because, after all, Android is an open source OSÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ it should be open to everyone.


 - This guide will help you grasp an ever-changing and stimulating market.
